name: portals hidden in plain sight
description:
PORTALS HIDDEN IN PLAIN SIGHT

a brief poem about the subway (again) for the Bitsy Public Transit Jam

all rooms but the last made with Pixsy: https://ruin.itch.io/pixsy

sound added with bitsy muse: https://kool.tools/bitsy/tools/bitsymuse-ui/

dedicated to everyone i've ever shared a subway car with, your faces probably populate most of the strangers in my dreams
